title: X-Metaverse
author: X-Metaverse
content: Cade has a dream; he aspires to be a notorious war commander. When struggling battleship designer Norman is invited to follow Cade on his journey, he believes he's finally hit a big break. But as Aidan and his newly recruited fleet begin a bloody rampage across the battlefield, will Norman's dream of becoming a famous battleship designer turn into a nightmare?
